news_title: Ethereum Hits New All-Time High for TPS Ahead of Fusaka Upgrade
news_subtitle: The Ethereum ecosystem has set a new record for transactions per second. Combined activity across Ethereum and all its Layer 2 networks reached 32,950 TPS, passing last week’s high of 31,000. This increase comes ahead of today’s launch of the Fusaka upgrade, which is expected to ...

news_title: ETHZilla takes stake in Karus to tokenize AI-modeled auto-loan portfolios
news_subtitle: ETHZilla acquires a 20% stake in AI startup Karus to launch tokenized, risk-tiered auto-loan portfolios and expand into the growing onchain debt market.

news_title: Ethereum Fusaka Upgrade Paves Way for Institutional Adoption
news_subtitle: Fusaka upgrade enhances Ethereum scalability and efficiency for institutional adoption. Rollup fees drop 15–60%, benefiting high-volume tokenized and DeFi flows. Block gas limits rise fivefold and PeerDAS improves data availability and throughput. The Ethereum Fusaka upgrade is g...

news_title: Startale USD Launches on Soneium as Sony Expands Web3 Payment Infrastructure
news_subtitle: Stablecoin News Startale Group launched a dollar-pegged stablecoin called Startale USD on Sony's Ethereum layer-2 network Soneium on Wednesday, aiming to serve as the primary settlement currency for payments and rewards across the electronics giant's blockchain ecosystem. The tok...

news_title: Fusaka is activated: Ethereum enters a new era

news_title: Ethereum Fusaka Upgrade Goes Live, Boosting Scalability Toward Instant Transactions
